6200.name: In The Forest
6200.description:
The trail ends here where the mountains begin abruptly. Looking up, you
note that the climb would be rough, hazardous, and probably not worth
the effort; the energy barrier continues up the mountain side out of
sight. The only exit is back to the east. The forest floor is carpeted
with fallen leaves. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

east.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

6201.name: In The Forest
6201.description:
To the west the mountains rise high up, rocky and lifeless. The trail
The path continues on heads west to the end of the forest, and back
east. Each way the strange energy barrier stands just to the north,
inscrutable, magical, and impenetrable. Ancient trees rise on all sides.
Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

east.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

west.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

6202.name: In The Forest
6202.description:
This trail runs parallel to the energy barrier to the north, seemingly
all the way up to the mountains to the west that form the boundries of
this valley. Walking along, you scare a small squirrel, which leaps
through the barrier without a second thought! Your hand is still
repulsed by the magical field, however. Branches intertwine overhead,
filtering the light. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

east.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

west.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

6203.name: In The Forest
6203.description:
The northern pathway stops abruptly here, halted by some sort of glowing
energy barrier running through the woods. A game trail, seemingly well
traveled, runs east- west along the magical barrier's length. Very
strange. Ancient trees rise on all sides. Bird calls echo through the
canopy.

east.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

south.description: A trail winds toward On The Narrow Trail

west.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

6204.name: In The Forest
6204.description:
The energy barrier runs through the woods on its east- west course here,
just north of the trail you are walking on. A faint humming seems to
eminate from the glowing field, pushing the normal sounds of the forest
into the background. For a short moment, you wonder if the field is
keeping something in, or you out. It makes you wonder... The forest
floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. Bird calls echo through the
canopy.

east.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

west.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

6205.name: In The Forest
6205.description:
The energy field makes a sudden ninety-degree turn here, running to the
north and west out of sight through the thickening woods. The trail you
are on curves to skirt the edge of the magical barrier in either
direction. Curious... who or what is keeping this field in place, and
for what purpose? The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.
Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

west.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

6206.name: In The Forest
6206.description:
The woods thicken here, and surpisingly, you see a tree completely cut
in half by the magical barrier running north-south here. The tree looks
healthy and unaffected by the energy field passing right through its
center. Odd... The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. Ancient
trees rise on all sides.

north.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

south.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

6207.name: In The Forest
6207.description:
The magical energy barrier runs straight north-south, unaffected by dips
in the grounds, intervening rocks and trees, everything. From the north,
you hear a faint rushing noise above the humming of the field. The trail
The area is continues to the north and south, only a few feet away from
the barrier it follows. Bird calls echo through the canopy. Branches
intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

south.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

6208.name: In The Forest
6208.description:
Here the field changes color, becoming almost transparent. Beyond, you
think you can make out a few shapes, but nothing too terribly distinct.
From the north comes the rushing sound of water, and through the trees
you believe Visible is a river cutting through the forest. The trail you
are on leads north-south through the woods, following the energy barrier
all along its length. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.
Ancient trees rise on all sides.

north.description: A trail winds toward The River's Edge

south.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

west.description: A steep trail ascends to Just Passing Through...

6209.name: The River's Edge
6209.description:
A river flows through the forest here, its water clean and clear. The
energy barrier runs right out into the middle of the river, and then
makes another ninety-degree turn to the west. The water seems to have no
problem penetrating the magical field, however. The river seems too wide
and too swift to cross here. It appears the only way to go is back to
the south. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. Bird calls
echo through the canopy.

south.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

6210.name: Just Passing Through...
6210.description:
The energy barrier seems to push against you ineffectively as you shove
your way through it. All your hairs stick up on your body from the
static electricity, and electric shocks sting your body from every
metallic piece of equipment you are carrying. You think with a final
shove, you can break through to the other side... The path is steep and
treacherous. Bare rock dominates the landscape.

east.description: A trail winds toward In The Forest

west.description: A trail winds toward The Edge Of The Orc Enclave

6212.name: A Clearing In The Forest
6212.description:
Several trails in the forest intersect here in a small clearing. The
dirt seems matted down, and you see many footprints in the soil. Nearby
you hear a bird's chirp abruptly cut off in a loud squawk, and then
silence. The paths seem well-traveled, the undergrowth matted down and
the foilage hacked away to leave plenty of room or a traveller to pass
in every cardinal direction, excepting the west path seems fairly
overgrown... You feel watched. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering
the light. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

north.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

east.description: A trail winds toward The Edge Of The Orc Enclave

south.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

west.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6213.name: A Forest Trail
6213.description:
The northern trail winds through the trees, heading from a forest
clearings to the south to where there appears to be a river's edge to
the north. This trail appears to be well-used and you spot many tracks
in the earth. Again the hairs on the back of your neck stand up, and you
wonder if you're being spied upon. Bird calls echo through the canopy.
The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

north.description: An open path leads to The River's Edge

south.description: A trail winds toward A Clearing In The Forest

6214.name: The River's Edge
6214.description:
A beautiful river flows swiftly by, the current looking quite dangerous
in fact. Out in the center of the river you spot the energy barrier
enclosure... no way out here. Looking up, you see a bird fly right
through the barrier overhead and wonder as to the force field's nature.
This path leads south into the forest, and westwards along the river's
edge. The open sky stretches overhead. Wildflowers dot the landscape.

south.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

west.description: An open path leads to The River's Edge

6215.name: The River's Edge
6215.description:
The river flows on its course, unhampered by the energy barrier passing
right down its center for as far as Visible is in both directions. The
path you are on travels along the length of the river to the east and
west inbetween the water and the forest's edge. Once again you shiver
and feel that unmistakeable sense that you are being watched.
Disturbing. The open sky stretches overhead. Tall grass sways in a
gentle breeze.

east.description: An open path leads to The River's Edge

west.description: An open path leads to The River's Edge

6216.name: The River's Edge
6216.description:
A large out-cropping of rock blocks this path along the river to the
west, and you don't spot any way around it; the woods are too thick to
the south, the river too swift to the north, the magical barrier above
you. This is a nice area, however, as evidenced by the amount of traffic
this path gets. From the marks in the grass, you guess that this is a
favored resting spot. The ground is soft underfoot. The open sky
stretches overhead.

east.description: An open path leads to The River's Edge

6217.name: A Forest Trail
6217.description:
This well-used forest trail leads south. Among the foot-tracks in the
dirt, you spot a few animal tracks as well, leading you to believe that
these trails are used by hunters. Why would they be enclosed in this
manner, however? There is a clearing to the north, and the path
continues to the south. Ancient trees rise on all sides. The scent of
pine and earth fills the air.

north.description: A trail winds toward A Clearing In The Forest

south.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6218.name: A Forest Trail
6218.description:
This trail leads north-south... obviously a gaming trail. The woods,
mostly deciduous trees with the accompanying ground foilage, crowd in to
either side. A shrub nearby shows a fresh cutting wound... looks like a
sharp object like a knife or machete did the damage. A crackle in the
leaves spins you around, to see nothing. Something is watching you, you
feel it. Where? The scent of pine and earth fills the air. Bird calls
echo through the canopy.

north.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

south.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6219.name: A Forest Trail
6219.description:
The trail changes direction here, turning to the north and west. A large
tree to the south bears an interesting artifact; a rusty arrowhead
embedded in the wood. It looks as if the arrow had been broken off at
the head, the wood scratched at, and the arrowhead left behind.
Otherwise, there doesn't seem to be much of interest in this particular
section of the woods. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.
Ancient trees rise on all sides.

north.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

west.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6220.name: A Forest Trail
6220.description:
This is a winding east-west path through the thickening forest. The
grass along the path is matted down from frequent traffic. The path
continues to the east, and there seems to be a small clearing to the
west. A faint noise makes you stand stock still. You could have sworn
you heard a voice nearby. Whatever it was, it wasn't speaking common.
Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light. Bird calls echo
through the canopy.

east.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

west.description: A trail winds toward A Small Clearing

6221.name: A Small Clearing
6221.description:
In the middle of this small clearing in the forest is a fairly large
rock sticking up out of the ground. Paths lead away to the east, west,
and south from here. The trees above block out the sky fairly
effectively, also blotting out the glowing energy barrier above your
head. Ancient trees rise on all sides. Bird calls echo through the
canopy.

east.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

south.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

west.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6222.name: A Forest Trail
6222.description:
A smaller northern path leads away from the main east- west trail here
towards a clearing. The main path leads windingly around the trees to
the east and west, the woods blocking out whatever may be ahead. Again
you get that strange feeling of being watched. The forest floor is
carpeted with fallen leaves. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

north.description: A trail winds toward A Small Clearing

east.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

west.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6223.name: A Forest Trail
6223.description:
The trail leads east and west here through the forest. To the west you
spot an area where a smaller path breaks off from the main track.
Eastwards seems to be another small clearing that seems to be well used;
there are many tracks leading in that direction. Ancient trees rise on
all sides. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

east.description: A trail winds toward The Dead End

west.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6224.name: The Dead End
6224.description:
The ground has been cleared of vegetation in this small clearing, and
several large, man-made salt licks lie on the ground and stand on poles
here. There are many animal tracks in the earth -- the salt licks must
attract wildlife for miles around. You think this would be a good place
to hide and wait for dinner if you were a hunter... The scent of pine
and earth fills the air. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

west.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6225.name: A Forest Trail
6225.description:
This trail leads east-west through the forest foilage, around the trees
and up and down the slight rises. The area is quiet and serene, except
for the energy barrier keeping you in to the south. For just a moment,
you wonder if you're still being watched... Branches intertwine
overhead, filtering the light. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen
leaves.

east.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

west.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6226.name: A Forest Trail
6226.description:
The trail bends here, leading away to the north and east. Far off the
the distance you hear the squawk of a large bird-of-prey searching the
skies for a meal. The ferns around rustle gently in the light
breeze. Somehow, the threatening aura that pervades over the rest of the
area seems absent here. You feel almost relaxed... The forest floor is
carpeted with fallen leaves. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the
light.

north.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6227.name: A Forest Trail
6227.description:
A bend in the forest trail allows you to go east and north here. To the
east you spot a small clearing, while northwards this trail seems to
join a much larger one leading through the woods. On the ground is half
of a broken knife handle, made of bone and dried leather, useless now.
You wonder if the owner is watching you now -- something certainly is.
Bird calls echo through the canopy. Branches intertwine overhead,
filtering the light.

north.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

east.description: A trail winds toward A Small Clearing

6228.name: A Forest Trail
6228.description:
This path leads from the main clearing to the west to intersect with a
north-south path just to the east. A small sapling on the north side of
the trail has a rope tied around one of its top branches; an unused
snare evidently. You still feel as if you're being watched in the back
of your mind, and adrenaline pumps into your brain like a lightning
fuzz. Ancient trees rise on all sides. The forest floor is carpeted with
fallen leaves.

east.description: A trail winds toward A Clearing In The Forest

west.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6229.name: A Forest Trail
6229.description:
A north-south trail leads through the woods here, with a small side
trail leading off to the east. The trees provide adequate cover from the
sky, but through a few holes in the foilage you spot the magical barrier
above, keeping you from escaping by flight. You feel slightly
captured. The scent of pine and earth fills the air. Bird calls echo
through the canopy.

east.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

south.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6230.name: A Forest Trail
6230.description:
Two trails come together here, a large northern path heading away from
tracks leading to the east and west. The western path seems to be the
most traveled, and the east hardly at all. There seems to be less trees
around here... it seems as if many have been cut down by some sort of
crude tools. This land clearing appears to be especially true to the
east. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. The scent of pine
and earth fills the air.

north.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

east.description: A trail winds toward A Clearing

west.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6231.name: A Clearing
6231.description:
The trees have been cut down around here, and many of the trunks
hollowed out with sharp stones and lined with treated leather to make
almost-waterproof tubs. A foul smelling brown fluid, tannin evidently,
fills many of these, soaking into various bits and pieces of animal
hides. Crude, but workable. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen
leaves. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

west.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6232.name: A Forest Trail
6232.description:
The trail is widening to the west, where the path leads all the way up
to the side of the mountains that enclose this valley. Many of the trees
have been cut down around here, and it definitely looks as if the forest
is ending. Eastwards the trail leads on into the thick of the forest. A
small split off trail leads away to the south here. The forest floor is
carpeted with fallen leaves. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

east.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

south.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

west.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6233.name: A Forest Trail
6233.description:
The ground is growing more rocky here. The trees and other foilage in
the forest grow sparse here, finding it hard to find purchase in the
soil. The forest ends just to the west, with the trail you are on
leading right on up to the side of the mountains. A side trail leads
south here, and the trail also leads back into the thick of the forest
to the east. Bird calls echo through the canopy. Branches intertwine
overhead, filtering the light.

east.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

south.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Rocky Trail

6234.name: A Rocky Trail
6234.description:
The ground is getting very rocky here, causing the trees of the woods to
become more sparse. Several bushes have found purchase in the soil, but
not near enough to block free movement in this area. The trail leads on
up to what appears to be a cave in the side of the mountain to the west,
and a side trail runs along the forest's edge to the north. To the east,
the trail runs deep into the forest out of sight. The wind carries the
scent of wild herbs. Rocks jut from the grassy slopes.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Rocky Trail

east.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

west.description: A steep trail ascends to A Cave Entrance

6235.name: A Forest Trail
6235.description:
The trail you are on bends around a large double- trunked tree and leads
away to the north and west. The green canopy of leaves overhead make
this area fairly dark and ominous, and that creepy 'watched' feeling
returns to hit you with full force. Branches intertwine overhead,
filtering the light. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

south.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

west.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6236.name: A Forest Trail
6236.description:
The trail continues here to the east and west, with a small trail
splitting off towards a large clearing to the south. Two wooden poles
with skulls on top warn you away from the south, and succeed in making
you feel quite uncomfortable. Strange... The scent of pine and earth
fills the air. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

east.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

south.description: An open path leads to A Large Clearing

west.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6237.name: A Large Clearing
6237.description:
The earth has been upturned many times here, and several white rocks
stick up from the ground in odd positions. Graveyard. This must be where
they bury their dead -- just dig a hole and throw the corpse inside,
ignoring any previous occupants in the ground. How uncivilized... you
hope you aren't taken care of in this matter when your time comes...
Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze. The air is fresh and clean.

north.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

6238.name: A Forest Trail
6238.description:
The trail splits here, one fork heading north towards the rushing sounds
of a river, and west where the forest seems to be thinning out a lot. A
sudden motion out of the corner of your eye catches your eyes, and you
turn your head. Nothing, there's nothing there at all. You wonder if
you're being stalked. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.
The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

north.description: An open path leads to A River's Edge

east.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Rocky Trail

6239.name: A River's Edge
6239.description:
The river flows swiftly on its course to the north. The trail you are on
leads on by the water's edge to the west, and back into the forest to
the south. A large boulder is just to the west, blocking all travel in
that direction. Out in the center of the river, the 'roof' of the energy
field meets the northern 'wall'. The water passes right on through the
magical barrier, however... the barrier is obviously porous to some
materials. The open sky stretches overhead. The air is fresh and clean.

south.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

west.description: An open path leads to A River's Edge

6240.name: A River's Edge
6240.description:
The river pours down the side of the mountains to the west, originating
from a large hole in the face of one of the sheer rock protuberances.
The energy barrier climbs right up the mountain, and seals off any means
of escape by that means. The trail you are on runs by the side of the
river to the east, and a path leads by the forest side to the south. The
air is fresh and clean. The ground is soft underfoot.

east.description: An open path leads to A River's Edge

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Rocky Trail

6241.name: A Rocky Trail
6241.description:
The forest is just to the west, with a side trail leading deep inside
from here. The main trail you are on, however, heads north towards the
river, and south near where a trail leads up to a cave in the mountain
side. There doesn't seem to be a whole lot to capture your attention
here... Rocks jut from the grassy slopes. The wind carries the scent of
wild herbs.

north.description: An open path leads to A River's Edge

east.description: A trail winds toward A Forest Trail

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Rocky Trail

6242.name: A Cave Entrance
6242.description:
The area is half blinded by the differences of the outdoors illumination
and the pure darkness of the cave. A deep, cloying stench flows out from
the cave mouth; the smells of decay, unwashed bodies, and sickness in
one roiling odor. Your stomach turns involuntarily, and you wonder about
going back down the hill to the east, instead of going even further down
the western tunnel. The air is thin and cold at this altitude. The path
is steep and treacherous.

east.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Rocky Trail

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Tunnel Forking

6243.name: A Tunnel Forking
6243.description:
The tunnel forks here, one branch leading north, the other west.
Additionally, you can head back outside to the east, which seems like a
very good idea to your tortured nasal passages. Your eyes water from the
stench, and you clench one side hand tightly to keep control of your
bile. Forcing your eyes open, you notice the warning signs painted
around the tunnel to the north. Sheep trails wind between the hillocks.
Rocks jut from the grassy slopes.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Tunnel

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Cave Entrance

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Tunnel

6244.name: A Tunnel
6244.description:
The floor is slick with the humidity that boils out of the lower reaches
of this cave, bringing that most awful smell with it. Again, you
consider saving your nose the trip west and down the tunnel, and heading
back east to the cave entrance. Rocks jut from the grassy slopes. The
wind carries the scent of wild herbs.

east.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Tunnel Forking

west.description: A steep trail ascends to A Tunnel

6245.name: A Tunnel
6245.description:
The tunnel takes a deep dip here, and opens up into a largish cave to
the west. There seems to be a few faint lights from inside, and you hear
some heavy breathing and low grunts from that direction. The cave
entrance to the east seems far too far away for your comfort... Snow
clings to shadowed crevices. The path is steep and treacherous.

east.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Tunnel

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

6246.name: A Cave
6246.description:
Heaps of rotting meat and cups of near-drinkable water sit here; the orc
food stores. The area opens here and wonder in near-disbelief at how the
orcs could find this stuff palatable. They're orcs; its their nature and
their stomachs you guess. Oddly enough, you don't even care to catalog
what they have available -- there's no chance you're going to take any
of this... The terrain rolls and dips around. Sheep trails wind between
the hillocks.

east.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

6247.name: A Cave
6247.description:
A single corpse lies here, well away from a pile of similars to the
east. There are several sharpened stakes and rocks sitting about
conveniently. The way the corpse is lying, the stone next to its hand...
this is a suicide area! You look down upon the orc and comprehend its
suffering in its twisted form. How sad. Rocks jut from the grassy
slopes. Sheep trails wind between the hillocks.

east.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

6248.name: A Cave
6248.description:
There are bodies here... corpses. Orcs, the lot of them, every single
one of them horribly disfigured in some senseless way; one whose arms
were removed, another who lacks anything that could sensibly be called a
face. A few twitch feebly with the last remains of life, the rest just
decompose. The dim sense of horror budding in your head blossoms as you
realize the pile in the corner consists of dead orc children awaiting
burial. Rocks jut from the grassy slopes. The wind carries the scent of
wild herbs.

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

6249.name: A Cave
6249.description:
A few sleeping pallets, made of moldy straw and stinking furs are
arranged around a small firepit here. A wooden cup, carved by a crude
tool and cruder hands sits near the ashes filled with water you consider
undrinkable. Somewhere to the east you hear an orc child's whining cry,
and a voice hushes it urgently. Beware, orcs! Adventurers are here! Hide
your children! Rocks jut from the grassy slopes. The wind carries the
scent of wild herbs.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

east.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

6250.name: A Cave
6250.description:
Several grass sleeping pallets are here, clustered around the remains of
an old fire. The sloping of the cave's ceiling allow for smoke
ventilation towards the surface in here you note, lucky for the orcs. A
few strings of burnt meat still hang over the fire, untended and
uneaten. On the floor near your feet you spy a small, twisted piece of
wire... one orc's idea of a treasured ring, no doubt. Kicking the
trinket away, you try to push the pity out of your heart for these
wretches. Sheep trails wind between the hillocks. The view stretches for
miles in every direction.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

east.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

6251.name: A Cave
6251.description:
The area opens just inside a largish cave, about a hundred feet in
diameter. A few dim make-shift lanterns burning animal fat illuminate
the area, just enough so Visible is the rotted food on the floor, and a
few bodies sprawled throughout the whole area. Your disgust quickly
turns to horror as you see a horrible creature, half... well, half
something and half orc dash between two stalagmites. Sheep trails wind
between the hillocks. The view stretches for miles in every direction.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Tunnel

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

6252.name: A Cave
6252.description:
This must be the orc chief's area. There's an old prize -- a stolen
timeworn human armchair sitting near the south wall as a throne. A
mammoth sleeping pallet made of piled furs is nearby. Next to that is
the pile of orc treasure; a pile of well-polished coppers. You look at
the pile of worthless coins and wonder at the image of orcish raiders.
These orcs aren't raiders, they are victims. Sheep trails wind between
the hillocks. The terrain rolls and dips around.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

east.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

6253.name: A Cave
6253.description:
Many sleeping pallets are arranged near the walls, each made of heavy
fur padding for comfort and warmth. Many are covered with blood and
other, unidentifiable substances. Looking around, your only coherent
thought is, 'Don't want to know... don't want to know...' The wind
carries the scent of wild herbs. Rocks jut from the grassy slopes.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

east.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

6254.name: A Cave
6254.description:
This area of the cave is one vast orc sickroom. Mutated and mangled orcs
lie on the floor, seeming quiet, lifeless. They're not even worth your
time, you think, unless you've the mercy to put them out of their
misery. You look at the corruption of nature's design and wonder what
forces are at work here... the barrier, the orcs... What's going on
here? The view stretches for miles in every direction. The wind carries
the scent of wild herbs.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Cave

6255.name: A Tunnel
6255.description:
This forking off from the mail tunnel seems odd; the walls are strangely
smooth, as if they were carved out by forces unknown. The end is abrupt
and short, but there is a steel door inset in the wall of the west side
of the tunnel. The smell from the lower tunnel doesn't seem nearly as
bad here... this might be a good place to rest and catch your breath.
The terrain rolls and dips around. Sheep trails wind between the
hillocks.

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Tunnel Forking

west.description: A large steel door.  There seems to be no hinges or knob, but there is a small keyhole in the exact center of it.

6256.name: A Tunnel
6256.description:
This section of man-made tunnel heads north from here, doors on either
side. A few glowing spots on the ceiling illuminate the area to almost a
daylight level. From the north you hear some horrible cries of pain and
anguish that make you cringe inside and think twice about heading in
that direction. Shadows gather in the corners. The ceiling hangs low
overhead.

north.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel

east.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Tunnel

west.description: This is a normal, wooden door.

6257.name: A Bedroom
6257.description:
This is a bedroom, catered to someone with a definite sense of taste.
There's a chest of drawers made of a solid section of oak tree. In fact,
most of the furniture here has that 'natural look' about it. The bed is
filled with soft down with an ornate table lamp close by. Nice place.
The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The air is still and
musty.

east.description: A normal, wooden door.

6258.name: A Tunnel
6258.description:
This tunnel opens up into a large room to the north, and to the south,
leads towards a set of doors. The light is crisp and bright, clearly
showing the lack of tool marks on the hewn walls... magic? The room just
ahead is large, and also well-lighted, giving it an almost clinical
atmosphere. Somewhere in the recesses of that room something cries out
in a horrible crackling voice. Not good. The air is still and musty.
Dust motes drift in the stale air.

north.description: A passage leads to The Laboratory

south.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel

6259.name: The Laboratory
6259.description:
A full fledge operating table is set up here, outfitted with a full set
of restraints. A ledge nearby has a whole array of sterile medical
equipment on it, covered over by a clear lid. There's a drain in the
floor with gradients leading to it to carry away the blood. For some
reason, you don't imagine this as a voluntary operating theatre... The
walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The ceiling hangs low
overhead.

east.description: A passage leads to The Laboratory

south.description: A passage leads to The Laboratory

6260.name: The Laboratory
6260.description:
Another table is set up will all sorts of alchemical apparatus here,
vials and beakers, distillation equipment and et cetera. The stuff looks
expensive, but bulky and fragile; not good treasure to cart away with
you at all. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The air is still and musty.

east.description: A steel cell door.

south.description: A passage leads to The Laboratory

west.description: A passage leads to The Laboratory

6261.name: A Cage
6261.description:
This is a small, dirty cage, with only a bucket for wastes, another
bucket for food, and a dirty towel for a bed. The whole room has a
terrible stench about it. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows gather
in the corners.

west.description: A steel cell door.

6262.name: The Laboratory
6262.description:
Some small cages sit here, containing many different types of rodents.
Leaning down to look better, you are very surprised as a tiny, common
garden mouse growls at you and tries to rip your face off through the
bars. There are some bulges on its back, and it doesn't seem to be in a
very good mood. It quivers some, not fully in control of its motor
functions. Poor thing. Shadows gather in the corners. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

north.description: A passage leads to The Laboratory

east.description: A passage leads to The Laboratory

south.description: A passage leads to The Laboratory

6263.name: The Laboratory
6263.description:
A rack stands near the cages on the eastern wall, filled with shackles
and manacles, bullwhips and worse. They all look well-used. You give a
shiver, and carry on. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

north.description: A passage leads to The Laboratory

east.description: A steel cell door.

south.description: A passage leads to The Laboratory

west.description: A passage leads to The Laboratory

6264.name: A Cage
6264.description:
This is a small, dirty cage, with only a bucket for wastes, another
bucket for food, and a dirty towel for a bed. The whole room has a
terrible stench about it. The air is still and musty. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

west.description: A steel cell door.

6265.name: The Laboratory
6265.description:
This is the southwest corner of the lab. There's no equipment here,
merely several pairs of heavy steel shackles on the southern wall.
There's also some a few small bloodstains on the floor beneath the
shackles. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The air is still and musty.

north.description: A passage leads to The Laboratory

east.description: A passage leads to The Laboratory

6266.name: The Laboratory
6266.description:
This is a fairly roomy laboratory that extends to the north, with cages
set on the east side of the room. A metal table here is empty, although
Visible is some outlines in the dust that suggest books had laid here
once. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Dust motes drift
in the stale air.

north.description: A passage leads to The Laboratory

east.description: A steel cell door.

south.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel

west.description: A passage leads to The Laboratory

6267.name: A Cage
6267.description:
This is a small, dirty cage, with only a bucket for wastes, another
bucket for food, and a dirty towel for a bed. The whole room has a
terrible stench about it. The air is still and musty. Dust motes drift
in the stale air.

west.description: A steel cell door.

6211.name: The Edge Of The Orc Enclave
6211.description: The forest thins here, revealing crude fortifications made from sharpened logs. The ground is trampled and littered with bones. This marks the boundary of orc territory.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to Just Passing Through...

west.description: A trail winds toward A Clearing In The Forest

6200.name: deer
6200.long_desc: A deer looks at you with fear in its eyes.
6200.description: That is one nice looking deer!

6201.name: rabbit
6201.long_desc: A small rabbit nibbles at a leaf here.
6201.description: It is a small, furry rodent with big ears.

6202.name: squirrel
6202.long_desc: A squirrel spots you and runs around a tree!
6202.description:
It is a small, brown squirrel.  Kind of like a
fuzzy high-tension spring.

6203.name: orc
6203.long_desc: An orc hunter looks at you with hateful eyes.
6203.description:
He looks angry, desperate, and maybe a little sick.
His green skin is definitely mottled, and he seems to
limp a little bit...

6204.name: orc
6204.long_desc: An orc chief growls at you!
6204.description:
He wears a crown of oak leaves to show he is a leader.  He
carries a club to show he is a warrior.  You wonder how good
he is at both.

6205.name: orc
6205.long_desc: An orc woman stands here, frightened of you.
6205.description:
As you stare her down, she raises her hands slowly, as if to
say, 'Don't kill me'.

6206.name: orc
6206.long_desc: An orc child frantically searches for her mother.
6206.description: She is raggedy, and seems to be covered with sores.

6207.name: orc
6207.long_desc: A pregnant orc woman tries to stand to flee from you.
6207.description:
She is too far gone to move very quickly.  You could
kill her easily.

6208.name: orc
6208.long_desc: A mutant orc lies here, barely alive.
6208.description:
Its body has been twisted beyond all hope.  It is dying, and
nothing will stop that.

6209.name: orc
6209.long_desc: A horribly mutated orc stands here, gibbering.
6209.description:
It doesn't even appear to have registered your arrival... it is
just talking to itself.  Its body is a twisted wreck of orc, man,
beast, and what-not.

6210.name: wizard
6210.long_desc: An elven wizard is here.  He looks angry.
6210.description:
He looks at you archly as he wonders why you have
invaded his domain.  No matter... it shouldn't be
too hard for him to destroy you, no?

6211.name: child
6211.long_desc: An elven child casts his fishing pole into the river.
6211.description: He looks young and innocent.  You wonder what he is doing here.

6212.name: mutant
6212.long_desc: A mutant... thing rushes at you!
6212.description:
It might've been an orc, once.  Now it is a living terror,
pushing everything out of its way to get at you.

6213.name: mutant
6213.long_desc: A mutant... thing tries to get you, but cannot move into range!
6213.description:
It might have been an orc, once.  Now it is a living terror,
pushing everything out of its way to get at you.

6201.name: manacles
6201.room_desc: A set of iron manacles lie here.

6202.name: shackles
6202.room_desc: A set of shackles sit here, discarded.

6203.name: Runestone
6203.room_desc: A small stone with an inscription sits here.

6204.name: club
6204.room_desc: A crude wooden club sits here.

6205.name: Starkblade
6205.room_desc: A knife hums with eternal energy here.

6214.name: orcish war belt
6214.room_desc: An orcish war belt lies here.
